ygData.subject: Re: Why I don't play a Warrior
ygData.msgSnippet: Umm...  whoever says this about clerics is stupid as hell At lvl 31 I group consistantly with a cleric.  This class is amazing.  If you think all they do is
ygData.messageBody:
Umm... whoever says this about clerics is stupid as hell

At lvl 31 I group consistantly with a cleric. This class is amazing. If
you think all they do is heal, you are very very wrong. Their dd's do stun
(amazing for rogues) and they can heal better than any other class. I want
to see your two druids heal you to full from 1 bar of life

Also if all you fight is yellows and reds you need to rethink your leveling
process. Whites and blues are excellent to fight if you are in groups that
handle large numbers well. Before you say all clerics do is heal, play one,
or play with a good one.
